import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import { clearItemFromCart } from '../../redux/cart/cart-actions' const Checkout = ({ cartItem }) => { const { name, imageUrl, price, quantity } = cartItem const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{name} {quantity} ${price}
dispatch(clearItemFromCart(cartItem))}>✕
) } export default Checkout
